Elder Of Filar:
The force Of [shilen] - this is the force of death. If these creatures I can somewhat develop, then they together with the earthworm will carry along all earth death and destruction.
The force Of [shilen] becomes increasingly more, soon earthworm finally will wake up.
The creation Of [shilen] will wander on everything to Aden. And then [Shutgart] will fall, and following it and Aden. Not so whether?
